::: {.cell hash='2018-02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_ab44fef5962f42d79679e02fd209ddf9'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)
dt <- fread("input.txt", header = FALSE)
head(dt)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                           V1
1: jplenqtlagxhivmwmscfukzodp
2: jbrehqtlagxhivmeyscfuvzodp
3: jbreaqtlagxzivmwysofukzodp
4: jxrgnqtlagxhivmwyscfukwodp
5: jbrenqtwagjhivmwysxfukzodp
6: jbrenqplagxhivmwyscfuazoip
```
:::

## Part 1


::: {.cell hash='2018-02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_010599fe8f41aff878ecb846fc3791b2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
sapply(strsplit(dt$V1, ""), function(x) {
  x <- table(x)
  x <- unique(x[x %in% 2:3])
}) |>
  unlist() |>
  unname() |>
  table() |>
  prod()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 8118
```
:::
:::


## Part 2


::: {.cell hash='2018-02_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_19739d8740db603684117bcd02bce871'}

```{.r .cell-code}
mat <- adist(dt$V1)
mat <- as.character(expand.grid(dt$V1, dt$V1)[which(mat == 1),][,1])
mat <- strsplit(mat, "")
paste0(mat[[1]][mat[[1]] == mat[[2]]], collapse = "")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "jbbenqtlaxhivmwyscjukztdp"
```
:::
:::
